div.div:
# For multi node communication
NVIDIA Infiniband:
400GB/s
Fallback: Ethernet 40GBps ~ 5GB/s
# For GPUs on single node
NVlink 3: 600GB/s
Fallback
:
PCIe 4.0 x16
32 GB/s

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
